create_time.description: Time the ClientTlsPolicy was created in UTC.

description.description: A free-text description of the resource. Max length 1024 characters.

effective_labels.description: All of labels (key/value pairs) present on the resource in GCP, including the labels configured through Terraform, other clients and services.

labels.description: Set of label tags associated with the ClientTlsPolicy resource. **Note**: This field is non-authoritative, and will only manage the labels present in your configuration. Please refer to the field 'effective_labels' for all of the labels present on the resource.

location.description: The location of the client tls policy. The default value is 'global'.

sni.description: Server Name Indication string to present to the server during TLS handshake. E.g: "secure.example.com".

terraform_labels.description: The combination of labels configured directly on the resource and default labels configured on the provider.

update_time.description: Time the ClientTlsPolicy was updated in UTC.

plugin_instance.description: Plugin instance name, used to locate and load CertificateProvider instance configuration. Set to "google_cloud_private_spiffe" to use Certificate Authority Service certificate provider instance.

block.description: The certificate provider instance specification that will be passed to the data plane, which will be used to load necessary credential information.

target_uri.description: The target URI of the gRPC endpoint. Only UDS path is supported, and should start with "unix:".

block.description: gRPC specific configuration to access the gRPC server to obtain the cert and private key.
Defines a mechanism to provision client identity (public and private keys) for peer to peer authentication. The presence of this dictates mTLS.

plugin_instance.description: Plugin instance name, used to locate and load CertificateProvider instance configuration. Set to "google_cloud_private_spiffe" to use Certificate Authority Service certificate provider instance.

block.description: The certificate provider instance specification that will be passed to the data plane, which will be used to load necessary credential information.

target_uri.description: The target URI of the gRPC endpoint. Only UDS path is supported, and should start with "unix:".

block.description: gRPC specific configuration to access the gRPC server to obtain the cert and private key.
Defines the mechanism to obtain the Certificate Authority certificate to validate the server certificate. If empty, client does not validate the server certificate.
